This is a Blazor Server application with the following features:
- Slider components loaded from JSON configuration
- Navigation menu with responsive design
- Bootstrap styling for UI components
- Service-based architecture with dependency injection

When working with this project:
- Use async/await patterns for data loading
- Follow Blazor component lifecycle methods
- Use dependency injection for services
- Maintain separation of concerns between data models, services, and UI components
- Use Bootstrap classes for consistent styling
